hooks.command: bash -c 'FILE=$(jq -r .tool_input.file_path); if [[ "$FILE" == *.rs ]]; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/rust" && cargo-1.89 check --quiet 2>&1 | head -20; elif [[ "$FILE" == *.ts || "$FILE" == *.tsx ]]; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/rust/immerse-tauri/ui" && npx tsc --noEmit --pretty 2>&1 | head -20; fi'
